name: HD Quiz – Limit Attempts
author: Harmonic Design

sections.description:
HD Quiz. The easiest way to create fun quizzes for your site

This is a FREE addon plugin for HD Quiz and cannot be used on its own. HD Quiz 1.7.0+ is required.

See a live demo of HD Quiz in action.

This addon will create a new Limit Attempts page for HD Quiz that will allow you to set the maximum number of times a user can take a quiz as well as set custom text for when this limit is reached.

You can also run the addon in three different modes: Logged in users only, all users, or hybrid mode.

== HOW TO USE | TUTORIAL ==

  • Install HD Quiz
  • Install this
  • Check the Limit Attempts page

Keywords

Quiz, quizzes, create a quiz, add a quiz, quiz plugin, hdq, harmonic design, limit attempts
